appDescription: TrueVision is a web application that allows you to view 3D models in a virtual environment.

AppConfig.devMode_Description: Various typical app config options, enables debug tools and analysis tools
AppConfig.devMode_WaypointNotes: Configures the waypoint marker orbs, the size value represents the diameter of the orb in millimeters
AppConfig.devMode_CameraAgentMarkersNote01: This switches on the camera agent markers, which are used to display the camera agent positions
AppConfig.devMode_CameraAgentMarkersNote02: These are the geometric markers created using the SketchUp Plugin and are named 'Camera_Agent_CAM001' etc
AppConfig.devMode_DebugMeshesNote: Shows debug information for all meshes in the scene including names and positions
AppConfig.devMode_ShowMeshBoundsNote: Shows bounding boxes around all meshes for debugging layout issues

AppConfig_NavMode.AppNavMode_Description_01: These Are Used To Determine The Navigation Mode Of The App
AppConfig_NavMode.AppNavMode_Description_02: If False the UI Buttons Will Not Be Displayed

AppNavMode_Waypoint.NavMode_WaypointDescription: Waypoint navigation allows predefined camera positions and paths
AppNavMode_Waypoint.NavMode_WaypointDataFileURL: Note: Use this to override the default data file, if different data is required

AppNavMode_Walk.NavMode_WalkDescription: Walk mode enables first-person style ground-level navigation

AppNavMode_Orbit.NavMode_OrbitDescription: Orbit mode allows camera rotation around a fixed point

AppNavMode_Fly.NavMode_FlyDescription: Fly mode enables free camera movement in 3D space

NavMode_FlyDefaultInitCoords.DefaultInitCoordInfo: Default Initial Camera Position - X, Y, Z In Millimeters
NavMode_FlyDefaultInitCoords.DefaultInitRotation: Default Initial Camera Rotation - X, Y, Z In Degrees

SceneConfig.SceneConfig_Description: This section contains all the configuration options for the scene

LightingConfig.LightingCfg_HdriLighting_Description: This section contains all the configuration options for the lighting
